CustomField.formula: If(amc__Mark_Up_Required__c, amc__Distance_Km_Miles__c * amc__Incurred_By__r.amc__Mileage_Rate__c + (( amc__Distance_Km_Miles__c * amc__Incurred_By__r.amc__Mileage_Rate__c) * amc__Project__r.amc__Expenses_Mark_Up__c), amc__Distance_Km_Miles__c * amc__Incurred_By__r.amc__Mileage_Rate__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the amount being claimed for the Distance
CustomField.label: Mileage Amount
